name: Stickman Skateboard Hill Ride
description:
There's a sand storm coming and your stickman needs to escape! Get on your skateboard and start hitting those jumps!

HOW TO PLAY

- Gain speed by touching the screen to make the skateboard heavy when moving downhill
- Dont touch the screen while moving uphill to maximize the speed you gained from sliding downhill
- Move fast! Or the dust storm will swallow you up!

FEATURES:
* Great for All Ages
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming
